title: Porale Lyrics Aayiram Vizhakku song lyrics
stanzas:
Porale
Nenja killikitu killikittu killikitu porale
Varaale
Nenja ahllikitu ahllikitu ahllikitu Varaale

Kutti pola poona pola enna vandhu suthuraye
Konda pota kozhi pola kitta vandhu kothuriye
Unna pola enna kolla aralivedha thevayilla

seo.title: Porale Lyrics Aayiram Vizhakku song lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Porale Lyrics Aayiram Vizhakku song lyrics from Aayiram Vilakku. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Srikanth Deva and sung by Karthik. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Aayiram Vilakku, Srikanth Deva, Karthik, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
